Major_Arcs.title: The Adventures of Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his initial confrontation with suspicious individuals, leading to a deeper mystery involving a yacht and a submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Human Meteor on the comic cover and then transitions to Duke's taxi driving job, where he picks up suspicious passengers.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Waterfront Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into the Human Meteor and confronts the suspicious sedan, leading to a fight and police involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Recovering in the hospital, the Human Meteor learns about a suspicious yacht and devises a plan to investigate it, shifting back to his Duke persona to execute his plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Radio Message

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Intrigue and Underwater Espionage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the investigation of the yacht 'Marlin,' revealing a Japanese submarine plot and underwater conflict, with Pete/Toby and Namor becoming central figures.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Cabin Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Pete, working on the yacht, becomes suspicious and investigates a cabin, leading to his discovery and ejection.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Investigation

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Underwater Mission and Submarine Plot
sub_scenes.description: Toby is briefed on a mission, discovers a sunken Japanese submarine, and witnesses enemy divers loading torpedoes, uncovering a spy plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Sunken Submarine and Enemy Diver

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Conflict and Namor's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Toby gets into a fight with enemy divers, a submarine escapes, and Namor intervenes with tentacles and torpedoes, shifting the battle dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Ship Alarm and Peter's Betrayal Revealed
sub_scenes.description: The ship crew discovers Peter's death and reacts to Namor's torpedo attack. Namor surfaces, learns of Peter's death, and uncovers Peter's treachery, which is confirmed to naval officers.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Pursuit of the Ship and Need for Air
Namor Surfaces and Learns of Peter's Death
Discovery of Depth Map and Peter's Treachery Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Departure and Hospital Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Namor and Toby make an urgent departure, followed by a scene at the hospital where they recover and reflect on the day's events, concluding their immediate adventure.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Liberty Lads and their fight against a Nazi spy ring, involving boys, marines, and a garage hideout, culminating in the ring's destruction.

sub_scenes.title: Street Combat and Ambulance Observation
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads are in combat with enemies, while boys on the street observe an ambulance arrival, setting up a connection between street action and a seemingly unrelated event.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Combat Against Enemies
Ambulance Arrival and Discovery of Injured Man

sub_scenes.title: Dropped Wallet and Garage Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet leading them to a garage and an encounter with a marine saluting a civilian, creating initial mystery and leading them to further investigate the garage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Garage Address
The Marine Salute and Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Mr. Horst Threat
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the garage, encounter a police officer who leads them inside, and are then confronted by the menacing Mr. Horst, escalating the danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Police Officer at the Garage
Inside the Garage and the Order to Wait
The Abrupt Arrival of Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Carbon Monoxide Plot, and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated by Mr. Horst while Major Bronson plots a carbon monoxide murder. Horst then betrays Bronson, allowing the boys to escape amidst the chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Waterfront Pursuit and Sabotage Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Boys seek help, head to the waterfront, and one of them discovers sabotage plans in a secret office, revealing the larger Nazi spy plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Nazi spies attack the Marine Barracks. The Marines, with the boys' help, fight back, leading to the dismantling of the Nazi spy ring and a celebratory resolution.

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Champ and Henry's adventure in South America, where they get entangled in a kidnapping case involving President Rosita's daughter and bandit El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are ambushed in a jungle landscape but arrive in a South American town, where they are soon suspected by local soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Soldier Interrogation and Kidnapping Explanation
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are interrogated by soldiers, who reveal that they are suspects in the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Plan to Seek Consul
Explanation: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Mistaken Identity Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are captured, but then mistaken for rescuers by Rosita's mother, leading to a humorous misunderstanding and a new direction.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltrating El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: A plan is formed to locate El Tigre, involving infiltration of his hideout using stage dollars as a diversion.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and Sock Attack

sub_scenes.title: Confusion and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Amidst chaos and mistaken identities, the search for Rosita continues, with interrogation and El Tigre's own agenda adding to the complexity.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
El Tigre's Concern about Name Misuse

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's location breaks, leading to an immediate rescue mission planned and executed by El Tigre's group.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Plan

sub_scenes.title: Post-Rescue Combat and Celebratory Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Combat continues post-rescue, culminating in Rosita's rescue and expressions of gratitude, leading to a celebratory resolution of the South American adventure.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Maid's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Devil Dog Dolan's jungle mission, where he faces betrayal, torture, and native warriors, ultimately finding an unexpected alliance and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: The arc starts with Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and then transitions to a briefing about Captain Lawton's son being held hostage for sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan infiltrates the jungle, tracking someone, but is ambushed by native warriors despite sensing danger.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Forced Compliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, interrogated, and brutally tortured to force him to hand over the sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Fire, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan escapes amidst chaos and fire, leading to an encounter with natives that shifts from conflict to alliance after the chief's death.

narrative_arcs.title: Office Confrontation, Chase, and Fire Start
Grauer's Plan and Native Huts Fire
Intentional Arson and Dolan in Flames

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Brawl, and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts back to the ship, where the Captain faces a dilemma, leading to a barroom brawl and ultimately a resolution attributed to Dolan's actions, ending with a paternal reprimand.

narrative_arcs.title: Barroom Brawl - Taste of American Lead
Order Rescinded, Shore Leave, and Dolan's Deed

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Murder Mystery: The Reilly Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to a complex case involving racketeers, sick children, and community solidarity.

sub_scenes.title: New Story Introduction and Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their new murder case: the killing of banker Robert Burgess and initial suspicion falling on Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on the Reilly Case

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: Twins head to police headquarters, learn Reilly skipped town but his sick child is in hospital, leading them to investigate the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Farnacci Connection
sub_scenes.description: Twins visit the hospital, find Miss Reilly very sick, learn she needs a rare blood type, and recognize the name Farnacci, suspecting foul play.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly
Encounter with the Sick Miss Reilly
Miss Reilly's Medical Needs and Farnacci's Blood

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Murphy's Confession
sub_scenes.description: Twins search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section, eventually meeting Mrs. Murphy who reveals Farnacci took the blame for the murder to get blood for her daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Heading to the Irish Section for Tom Reilly
Continuing the Search and Hearing Whispers
Meeting Mrs. Murphy and the Confession
Farnacci's Mob Threat and Mr. Murphy's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: A taxi arrives at Murphy's house, leading to an ambush, with Dan pursuing the shooters while Diane follows in another taxi.

sub_scenes.title: Community Uprising and Police Apprehension
sub_scenes.description: The community reacts to the shooting, forming a blockade, while police arrive and apprehend the shooters, ending the immediate threat.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Emergency and Blood Transfusion
sub_scenes.description: Injured are rushed to the hospital, where Tom Reilly needs a blood transfusion. The community rallies to donate blood, leading to a successful transfusion and recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: A plan is made to arrest Farnacci, leading to a police raid and his apprehension, followed by a birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly, marking a happy ending.
